ygData.msgSnippet: Guys, this is all really stupid. Unless Death has Magmatron strapped to a table and has hacked into his head, I don t see how he d be able to download squat

Guys, this is all really stupid. Unless Death has Magmatron strapped 
to a table and has hacked into his head, I don't see how he'd be able 
to download squat without the other bot's permission. Bots arn't 
exatly based on the honor system, you know.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> Look at post 22714, it makes it pretty clear that Magmatron dl's 
through a cable in his head.
